titleStmt.title: A declaration of the knights and gentry of the county of Hertford that adhered to the late King
titleStmt.author: Fanshawe, Thomas Fanshawe, Viscount, 1596-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Daniel Pakeman at the Rainbow in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Thomas Fanshaw Kt of the Bath [and 13 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
